_sText:
Onslaught - Day
==================
------------------
### Version 2

##### Changes:

- New route to hostages
- Skybox lowered
- Re-optimized for better performance
- Added 2nd hostage rescue zone
- Custom radar corrected
- Re-imagined T-Spawn
- Added clip brushes to keep players off of ledges

Notes:
At the end of the new route there is a breakable wall that leads into the room with the hostages. In this version a knife can destroy it which seems unrealistic.  I could have it where you could destroy the wall but then the wood frame would require a grenade or a gun of higher power(ex. Desert Eagle, Scout).  If enough people think this would make for better game play let me know.

Video from Original cs_onslaught:

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/r8n5zo_j1js" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
